Hekkingen Lighthouse () is a coastal lighthouse located in the Malangen fjord in Senja Municipality in Troms county, Norway. It was first lit in 1859. The lighthouse was listed as a protected site in 2000.
Climate
|source 2= Meteostat Hekkingen
